alert.note: Alert for Umatilla; Union (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 2:01PM PDT until August 10 at 2:30PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM PDT FOR EAST CENTRAL UMATILLA AND WEST CENTRAL UNION COUNTIES... At 201 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kamela, or 8 miles southeast of Meacham, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hilgard and Kamela. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
